links.p: The accommodation capacity of the Morava restaurant is located on Vuk Karadžić Boulevard in the heart of Čačak. It offers 24 accommodation units and 4 LUX apartments, making it ideal for all kinds of celebrations. This modern event hall, which can accommodate up to 500 people, will delight you with its beautiful ambiance and national cuisine specialties.

Hotel Kole 3* is located in the beautiful Konjevići, just 3 km from the center of Čačak, along the main road from Belgrade to Podgorica. This hotel offers peace, silence, and a pleasant, homely atmosphere, making it the perfect place to relax and escape from daily stress. An ideal destination for anyone who wants to enjoy nature and comfort!

Hotel Livade 3* is located in Preljina, near the roundabout where the road from the Ibarska Magistrala separates for Čačak. Built in 1980, it is one of the most famous hospitality facilities in Western Serbia. Modernly equipped rooms, excellent location, and professional, friendly staff will make your stay exceptionally pleasant. A perfect place for all kinds of guests!

Hotel Beograd is the only hotel located in the pedestrian zone in the center of Čačak. The hotel's accommodation capacity includes 35 modernly equipped rooms and suites with an elegant touch of tradition. Each segment of the hotel is recognized for its uniqueness, which our guests love, cherish, and which creates a memorable experience during their first stay.

Zdravljak is located in the heart of the Gornja Trepča spa, near the healing water spring and natural healing center. Mineral waters with specific physical and chemical characteristics assist in rehabilitation. We have 32 beds in 16 double rooms. Our restaurant offer includes a variety of ready-made meals, grilled dishes, and local cuisine specialties, ideal for every taste.

The oldest and most famous kafana in Čačak, founded in 1883 and renovated in 1903, has preserved its original appearance. This kafana, radiating the charm of the old Čačak market, is a popular gathering place. It is known for national cuisine specialties such as cornbread, cracklings, jellies, and grilled dishes. We also organize smaller celebrations for up to 90 people.

Restaurant 'Plaža' is located by the Međuvršje Lake, 15 km from the center of Čačak. This restaurant stands out with its rich selection of wines that perfectly complement dishes from both domestic and international cuisines. We proudly offer world-class dishes, such as classic steak with grilled vegetables, 'Surf&Turf' steak, and tuna steak. Also, there is lamb under the bell and fresh fish, for which we are especially known. Come and enjoy!

Restaurant Lovac is located in the Čačak municipality, by the city beach. With quality service and professional, friendly staff, your celebration here will become unforgettable. Long-standing tradition and extensive experience in organizing celebrations make us the ideal choice for all your special moments. Visit us and enjoy the unique atmosphere!

Caffe Restaurant Proleće is located in the city center of Čačak, across from the town square. For years, this beloved place has gathered Čačak locals of all generations. After renovations in 2018, Proleće has become synonymous with a unique and original hospitality offer. Its distinctive exterior and interior in industrial style leave a strong impression on all guests, making every stay special.
